Question: Shenzhen Bassworld Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Bassworld Technology Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Wireless Hybrid ANC Headphone
  - Superior Noise-Canceling Technology, 38dB
  - Touch Control Functionality
  - Exceptional Sound Quality
  - Comfortable and Ergonomic Design
  - Long Battery Life, 30 hours
